title: 《来自自然的色彩》活动页
content:
[[module css]]

.page-tags {
    display: none;
}

#breadcrumbs {
    display: none;
}

body, #container-wrap-wrap, #container-wrap, #content-wrap, #page-content {
    min-height: unset !important;
}

.page-content {
    height: 95vh;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0px;
}

#header {
    background-position: 1em 4em;
    background-size: 88px 88px;
    display: none;
}

#content-wrap {
    margin: 0 auto 0;
    max-width: 1040px;
    padding: 0em 0em 0em 0em;
}

#main-content {
    max-width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
}

#container-wrap {
    background: none;
}

#page-content {
    min-height: 720px;
}

#container {
    background: white;
}

#page-title {
    display:none;
}

/*
div#page-options-container {
    display:none !important;
}
*/

/*页脚*/
#footer {
    display:none !important;
}

/*CC注明*/
.license-area {
    display:none;
}

#side-bar {
    display: none;
}

div#page-options-container {
    display:none !important;
}

table {
    border-spacing: 0px;
}

p {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-block-start: 0em;
    margin-block-end: 0px;
    margin-inline-start: 0px;
    margin-inline-end: 0px;
}

.activity {
    transform: rotate(90deg);
    position: Fixed;
    right: 14vw;
    top: 185vw;
    width: 100vw;
    white-space: nowrap;
    color: #fff;
    font-family: 楷体;
}

.activity-ex {
    transform: rotate(90deg);
    position: Fixed;
    right: 30vw;
    top: 170vw;
    width: 100vw;
    white-space: nowrap;
    color: #fff;
    font-family: 楷体;
}

.background {
    height: 100vh;
    width: 100vw;
    z-index: -1;
    position: fixed;
    right: 0%;
    TOP: 0px;
}

.checkpoints {
    transform: rotate(90deg);
    position: Fixed;
    right: 29vw;
    top: 46vw;
    width: 11vh;
    white-space: nowrap;
}

a {
    color: #fff;
}

a:visited {
    color: #fff;
}

.checkpoints a {
    color: #000;
}

.checkpoints a:visited {
    color: #000;
}

.introduce {
    transform: rotate(90deg);
    position: Fixed;
    right: 24vw;
    top: 100vw;
    width: 50vw;
    height: 75vw;
    color: #fff;
}

.back {
    transform: rotate(90deg);
    position: Fixed;
    right: 2vw;
    top: 19vw;
    width: 17vw;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: left;
    padding: 5px 20px 4px 12px;
}

.log {
    transform: rotate(90deg);
    position: Fixed;
    right: 2vw;
    top: 17vh;
    width: 100vw;
}

/*迭代*/
u-log-15, #u-log-14, #u-log-13, #u-log-12, #u-log-11, #u-log-10, #u-log-9, #u-log-8, #u-log-7, #u-log-6, #u-log-5, #u-log-4, #u-log-3, #u-log-2, #u-log-1 {
display: none;
}

#u-view-15, #u-view-14, #u-view-13, #u-view-12, #u-view-11, #u-view-10, #u-view-9, #u-view-8, #u-view-7, #u-view-6, #u-view-5, #u-view-4, #u-view-3, #u-view-2 {
display: none;
}

#u-log-15:target~#u-view-15, #u-log-14:target~#u-view-14, #u-log-13:target~#u-view-13, #u-log-12:target~#u-view-12, #u-log-11:target~#u-view-11, #u-log-10:target~#u-view-10, #u-log-9:target~#u-view-9, #u-log-8:target~#u-view-8, #u-log-7:target~#u-view-7, #u-log-6:target~#u-view-6, #u-log-5:target~#u-view-5, #u-log-4:target~#u-view-4, #u-log-3:target~#u-view-3, #u-log-2:target~#u-view-2, #u-log-1:target~#u-view-1 {
display: block;
}

div:target~#u-view-15, div:target~#u-view-14, div:target~#u-view-13, div:target~#u-view-12, div:target~#u-view-11, div:target~#u-view-10, div:target~#u-view-9, div:target~#u-view-8, div:target~#u-view-7, div:target~#u-view-6, div:target~#u-view-5, div:target~#u-view-4, div:target~#u-view-3, div:target~#u-view-2, div:target~#u-view-1{
display: none;
}

@media screen and (orientation: portrait) {
  .landscape {
      display: none;
  } 
} 
@media screen and (orientation: landscape) {
  .portrait {
      display: none;
  } 
#page-content div table {
    max-width: 100%;
}
}

[[/module]]
